channel.title: A few questions that could really help me out = ]
channel.description:
ok number 1. food timers how would i add a food timer so ppl cant mass eat -.-
2. my main question. how do you add timers to avoid massing!
3. does anyone know rune c'bow and or real rs2 karils c'bow gfx/emote

item.title: A few questions that could really help me out = ]

nah if u’ve noticed karils and c’bow are a bit different = /

item.title: A few questions that could really help me out = ]
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

no look heres an example of how to use it

case XXXXX: if(actionTimer == 0) { setAnimation(AAA); sendMessage("ENTER A MESSAGE TO THE USER HERE!"); actionTimer = 80; addSkillXP((XP*playerLevel[S]), S); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;
and what are you talking about, mopar emotes ARE rs2 emotes…unless you mean there whip attack n stuff we dont have that

Read full topic

item.source: A few questions that could really help me out = ]

item.title: A few questions that could really help me out = ]
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

2075 is the emote for shooting the xbow
0427 is the range(crossbow) emote
and your food should have cases, for example take the number of a manta and CTRL + F find it, i think its 823, then itll look like

case 823: stuff here break;
you gotta make it look like this

case 823: if (actionTimer <= 0) { stuff here } else { return = false } break;
note: that actiontimer example wont work depending on your source
to assign a weapon an attack emote, use this
make sure your putting this under

public int GetWepAnim()

then copy n paste this, and fill out the ####s

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####) // weapon { return ####; //emote }
post for more help
if anyone would like to correct me, please do(a couple month break and im rusty ;s)

Read full topic
